melting.ionCorrection.mixedNaMgCorrections

Class Tan07MixedNaMgCorrection

  • java.lang.Object
    • melting.correctionMethods.EntropyCorrection
      • melting.ionCorrection.mixedNaMgCorrections.Tan07MixedNaMgCorrection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CorrectionMethod, NamedMethod

    public class Tan07MixedNaMgCorrection
extends EntropyCorrection
implements NamedMethod
    This class represents the mixed (Na,Mg) correction model tanmix07. It extends EntropyCorrection. Zhi-Jie Tan and Shi-Jie Chen, "RNA helix stability in Mixed Na+/Mg2+ solutions", 2007, Biophysical Journal, 92, 3615-3632.

        public boolean isApplicable(Environment environment)
        Description copied from interface: CorrectionMethod
        Check if the environment chosen by the user is a applicable with the correction model.
        Specified by:
        isApplicable in interface CorrectionMethod
        Overrides:
        isApplicable in class EntropyCorrection
        Returns:
        false if the correction method can't be used with the Environment. If the environment can make the results less reliable, a warning message will appear.
